name: 陳怡倩
objective: This course aims to introduce students to visual culture of the target language. Online authentic materials and social media will be used as the course materials to introduce students to various cultural themes. Through group discussion exercises and presentations, students’ target cultural sensibility and English communication skills will be cultivated.
